snippet: Improved play from Martin Brodeur and a defensive unit that has shrugged off a number of injuries have boosted the fortunes of a traditionally successful franchise.
lead_paragraph: Improved play from Martin Brodeur and a defensive unit that has shrugged off a number of injuries have boosted the fortunes of a traditionally successful franchise.

headline.main: Devils Overcome Poor Start and Regain Successful Formula
headline.print_headline: Devils Overcome Poor Start and Regain Successful Formula
